subtitle: I remember like everybody I'm sure
remembers I've classmates in my class
when I was a kid remember one particular
guy was so cool very quiet would be like
the classic introverts and everybody
thought including my teacher that he was
a stupid guy because whenever any time
any challenge or any any particular
question was raised he was always quiet
teacher looked to him he was too shy to
speak I got to know him over the years
we went to elementary school together
and I came to realize the guy's
brilliance he probably the smartest guy
in the class we had later many
challenges in his life as we go to high
school and so on but he was the smartest
guy in the class no question about it he
was just a very very internal very what
we call in a Hasidic language pretty
music
he was an internal person who's a very
quality person and he was a kid I mean
we're children it wasn't like developed
and matured yet but he was a person had
not other circumstances life coming what
in the way would have been unbelievable
you know really sincere gentle very
sensitive persons really understood
other people he had a deep empathy and
you really get to know him you start
saying is this guy what is he exactly
now is he an introvert and I said I
still haven't defined even the word in a
way that's acceptable to all of us but
he definitely appeared like an introvert
because he would not go out he was not
interested in parties was interested in
people even you know in the beginning he
wouldn't even show friendship you know I
didn't have to pull teeth because he did
have what to say but we became very
friendly and I certainly met him even
years later as I said he had other
things that got into the way of his life
but but it was a classic I remember the
misunderstanding of a child that can be
the best kid in the class but nobody
understands the person because you know
we like cookie cutter money like the
popular kid everyone likes when
necessary is that so the best person in
the room now he wasn't bullied thank God
so it wasn't that he didn't have that
problem but sometimes these type of
children are also bullied because
they're they seem vulnerable and they
seem you know you can pick on them the
point is that so much of our lives as
children as
is so defined by how others see us in
this context our social status and how
popular we are and how outgoing we are
how not outgoing we are and very often
the introverts get the brunt of the
criticism as being oh he's a loner
he broods like the Brule he or she so
this is a really a tremendous as it's a
critical aspect to our personality and

how do we look at this so here's the

I'm not gonna quote the exact sources
right now but coming from that place
talking about what really defines a

wired that way some of us are wired
extroverts and summers introverts is it
something like I said before we assume

through influences around us or there's

because you can't answer the question
